Services.name: Domestic
Services.text: Impex Domestic pumps are Ideal for homes to maintain water pressure in taps and for general applications like watering for gardens and fountains.

Services.name: Agriculture
Services.text: Impex pumps easily meet varied agricultural needs, be it drip irrigation, agricutural sprinkler systems or in the watering of fields.

Services.name: Industrial
Services.text: Impex Pumps are used in industries for a variety of purposes that include Cutting & Grinding, fire-fighting, managing sewage, heating & cooling of systems etc.

Services.name: Commercial Building Sector
Services.text: Shakti pumps is a major force in places like hotels, corporates, malls etc. where heavy pressure and boosting is required. It supplies pumps with the latest digital technology for Cooling, Heating, Waste water management etc.

Services.name: Solar
Services.text: A channel partner for the Ministry of New & Renewable Energy (MNRE), Shakti Pumps has a range of Solar pumps between 1HP to 100 HP that are simple and easy to operate, offering 40% more discharge than other ordinary pumps.

Services.name: Sewage & Drainage
Services.text: From draining flooded water from various areas like basements, car parks, empty cesspools to managing sewage in a water treatment plant, Shakti Pumps are widely used in the domestic, industrial as well as other sectors.
